name: Alcohol Action Ireland
goal:
Alcohol Action Ireland is the national charity for alcohol-related issues. We are an independent voice for advocacy and policy change, working to reduce levels of alcohol-related harm in Ireland.

We campaign for the burden of alcohol-related harm to be lifted from the individual, community and state, and have a strong track record in campaigning, advocacy, research and information provision.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Public Health, Sport, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
1.Audio Visual Media Services Directive (AVMSD) : Stakeholder Review on the European Commission’s .
2.Public Consultation on the effectiveness of the AVMSD
3.European Commissions review of Alcohol Tax policy
4.EC’s upcoming review of the effectiveness of self –regulation in respect to alcohol labelling.
5. EAHF - new methodology and approach
